name: Exodus Garden 2A
notes: Boss is a big floating servitor. You can melt it and skip the ads in the final room.

name: Aphelionâ€™s Rest

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: Appear on far away platforms, and often move behind cover.

burnDesc: Taken Acolytes and Boss have Stasis weapons that slow and freeze you.

shields.name: Void
shields.desc: Taken Acolytes all have Void shields.

modifiers.name: Epitaph
modifiers.desc: Taken combatants generate blight geysers when defeated.

notes: Taken Psions duplicate frequently and quickly. Lots of Stasis AOE damage in the boss area.

name: Bay of Drowned Wishes

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: One outside of the cave barrier, and one on the far platform in the boss room.

champions.name: Unstoppable
champions.desc: Last champion spawns when you get closer to the cave barrier. Each spawn is accompanied by many Screebs.

shields.name: Void
shields.desc: One Scorn Raider on a far away platform.

modifiers.name: Raider Shield
modifiers.desc: Scorn Raiders now have Void shields.

notes: Lots of Screebs. Boss room ads seem to spawn infinitely. Ads will jump up onto the platform where you enter.

name: Chamber of Starlight

champions.name: Overload
champions.desc: On far away platform and can be sniped at.

shields.name: Void
shields.desc: Taken Acolytes all have Void shields. Wizard Boss has Void shield.

modifiers.name: Epitaph
modifiers.desc: Taken combatants generate blight geysers when defeated.

notes: Lots of Taken Acolytes and Thrall.
